required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Validity and Reliability Study of the Motor Accuracy Test
clinical_study.official_title: Randomised, Validity and Reliability Study of the Motor Accuracy Test in Turkey, One of the Sensory Integration and Praxis Tests

brief_summary.textblock: The Motor Accuracy-Revised Test's validity and reliability in Turkey was studied in this paper.

detailed_description.textblock: The study sample group consists of 100 children who are studying in a primary school registered to Hatay Provincial Directorate of National Education. The children`s ages range between 6 years and 8 years 11 months.

primary_outcome.description: The Motor Accuracy-Revised Test was implemented on each of the studied children through test-retest.

study_pop.textblock: The study sample group consists of 100 children who are studying in a primary school registered to Hatay Provincial Directorate of National Education. The children`s ages range between 6 years and 8 years 11 months.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- not having any physical, psychological or mental disabilities,
- to be aged between 6 years and 8 years and 11 months,
- to have the consent of both the child and the parents.
Exclusion Criteria:
- identified as having any kind of physical, visual or hearing disabilities,
- having mental retardation, or possessing a learning disability.
